channel.title: [arch]alsa help
channel.description:
I have a
00:14.2 Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc SBx00 Azalia (Intel HDA)
I followed this: http://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/ALSA
used alsaconf and made the changes to modprobe.conf (I dont even have a pc speaker). I also added @alsa to my daemons in rc.conf then I unmuted my master and pcm channels
My audio has 7.1 hd audio and I have 2.1 speakers
but the problem is, there's no audio; please help

item.title: [arch]alsa help
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

nope its just integrated sound

nevermind it works now. got help from archforums

Read full topic

item.title: [arch]alsa help
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Do you have another sound card? ALSA might just be trying to use that one.

Read full topic
